APM.name: APM
APM.description: When <c=action>launching</c> <c=midrow>objects</c>, <c=midrow>stack</c> them on top and lose <c=status>APM</c> for each other object in the <c=midrow>stack</c>. <c=downside>If not enough, the <c=midrow>stack</c> becomes <c=midrow>wobbly</c>.</c>

StackedLaunch.name: Stack
StackedLaunch.description: The <c=midrow>object</c> will be <c=midrow>stacked</c> on top of any existing <c=midrow>objects</c>.

Stacked.name: STACKED
Stacked.description: <c=midrow>Stacked objects</c> take turns in order. The top one takes all hits.

CardDrone.name: CARD DRONE
CardDrone.description: Beams a card at you once per turn.

Stabilize.name: Stabilize
Stabilize.description: Remove <c=midrow>Wobbly</c> from the closest <c=midrow>wobbly stack</c> to your <c=part>missile bay</c>.
